analytic.title: Severus of Antioch on Ancient Church Customs: The Significance of Cyprian’s Letters as Quoted by Severus and Oriental Canonical Collections

monogr.title: The Third Lung: New Trajectories in Syriac Studies. In Honor of Sebastian P. Brock

body.bibl: Camplani, Alberto. “Severus of Antioch on Ancient Church Customs: The Significance of Cyprian’s Letters as Quoted by Severus and Oriental Canonical Collections.” In The Third Lung: New Trajectories in Syriac Studies. In Honor of Sebastian P. Brock, edited by Brouria Bitton-Ashkelony, Miriam Lindgrern Hjälm, and Robert A. Kitchen, 173–92. Eastern Christian Studies 33. Leiden: Brill, 2023.

Alberto Camplani, Severus of Antioch on Ancient Church Customs: The Significance of Cyprian’s Letters as Quoted by Severus and Oriental Canonical Collections, in The Third Lung: New Trajectories in Syriac Studies. In Honor of Sebastian P. Brock, ed. Brouria Bitton-Ashkelony, Miriam Lindgrern Hjälm, and Robert A. Kitchen, Eastern Christian Studies 33 (Leiden: Brill, 2023), 173–92.
